title: Baskin
review: Far better than {Dabbe: Curse of the Jinn}, the only other Turkish horror movie I've seen. It has a very interesting depiction of hell, but I wish it went farther and committed harder. The set is good, but I wanted the characters to descend another few floors through it, where things could become more twisted and unreal. I liked the long introduction scenes, but I didn't care for the gimmicky ending.
